attributes.name: [AWS WAF OTEL] High request rate from single source IP

esqlQuery.esql:
// Alerts when a single IP address generates more than 500 requests in 10 minutes, indicating potential brute force attack, web scraping, or DDoS activity. Normal users rarely exceed 100 requests in 10 minutes.
// You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the request_count in the WHERE clause.
FROM logs-aws.waf.otel-default
| WHERE client.address IS NOT NULL
| STATS request_count = COUNT(*) BY client.address
| WHERE request_count > 500
| SORT request_count DESC
